biotools.summary: MtbVeb is a web-based platform developed for designing vaccines against existing and emerging strains of mycobacterium tuberculosis. This includes drug resistant and extreme drug resistant M.Tb strains. It also allow users to design vaccines against M.tb using all three appraches (strain, antigen and epitope based vaccines).
